title: Riot on URF Updates
body:
http://i.imgur.com/JHp8jKc.jpg

Average League player's response:

http://i.imgur.com/DFQax5F.jpg

replies.body:
Well {{champion:27}} is easy to counter in this simple rule that absolutely everyone forgets despite it being well known as the **#1** rule in League of Legends!

* Don't chase Singed
That is why he should get a charm.... Ima just go now before I meet a window.
Why would he need a charm? He already has a taunt on his... *checks game info* ...Wait, so this whole time I was chasing him on my own free will?

Naw, it is some of that invisible power everyone is going on about.  Must have happened with the most recent Singed buff. 

(I am not talking about the QoL change he just got, I mean his last "buff" for people that remember about it.)

The best buff in the game? The one where he laughs whenever he throws someone?

I remember that.
I mean, that laugh is pretty much a taunt right?
Huh, never thought of it like that.
Especially when it's on a steal kill. When your own teammates are chasing you... somethin's up.
As a {{champion:68}} Main... I somewhat support QoL changes for him... depends on what they are... *cough* buff his W *cough*
It's okay, I got over the {{champion:68}} cancer when I got to outduel him repeatedly one game late as {{champion:1}}. {{item:3135}} + {{item:3146}} <3
What did the Rumble have? I swear if he built what I think he. Then he's dead to me.
Not {{item:3146}}. He's dead to me too...
